author: NetworkChuck
description:
Check out Equinix and learn more about how they power the internet: https://eqix.it/4gioy31

What if I told you the world’s biggest companies don’t use the internet like you and me? Instead, they connect directly to each other inside some of the most secure and connected buildings on earth. Today, we’re going inside one of those places, the legendary Dallas infomart and Equinix DA11, where billions of dollars of equipment, AI GPUs, and the backbone of the internet lives.


TIMESTAMPS:
0:00 - Intro / The Internet Lives Here
0:40 - Why Getting Inside is SO Hard
1:30 - The Dreaded Man Trap
2:18 - We're Not Allowed to Walk Alone
3:04 - Finally Entering the Data Center
5:26 - What's Hiding in Those Server Cages?
7:30 - Cooling & Power
9:15 - The Generator Yard (Heartbeat of the Building)
9:47 - Bypassing the Internet
13:47 - Equinix Fabric
17:06 - The People Who Make it All Work



🔥🔥Join the NetworkChuck Academy!: https://ntck.co/NCAcademy 



**Sponsored by Equinix







SUPPORT NETWORK
title: THIS Is Where the Internet Lives
